Introduction
This topic contains information on establishing exposure to environmental or military occupational hazards, including
establishing exposure to environmental or military occupational hazards
reviewing evidence to establish exposure to environmental or military occupational hazards
considering lay statements in establishing exposure to environmental or military occupational hazards
verifying service at the Qarmat Ali Water Treatment Plant
establishing exposure to
the sulfur fire at the Mishraq State Sulfur Mine
, and
pollutants near the Naval Air Facility (NAF) at Atsugi, Japan
, and
establishing military occupational exposures
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 9, Section B - Processing Claims Based on Exposure to Specific Environmental or Military Occupational Hazards
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 9, Section B
